mapper.select: SELECT a_id, a_user_name, a_user_password, a_age, a_sex, a_phone, a_register_date FROM t_account WHERE a_user_name LIKE '%${partOfName}%'
SELECT a_id, a_user_name, a_user_password, a_age, a_sex, a_phone, a_register_date FROM t_account WHERE a_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partOfName}, '%')
SELECT a_id, a_user_name, a_user_password, a_age, a_sex, a_phone, a_register_date FROM t_account WHERE a_user_name LIKE "%"#{partOfName}"%"
SELECT a_user_name FROM t_account WHERE a_id IN(${ids})
SELECT a_id, a_user_name, a_user_password, a_age, a_sex, a_phone, a_register_date FROM ${tableName}
